import React,{useEffect,useRef}from"react";import{BrowserRouter as Router,Routes,Route}from"react-router-dom";import Header from"./components/Header";import Home from"./pages/Home";import About from"./pages/About";import Works from"./pages/Works";import WorksDetail from"./pages/WorksDetail";import Admin from"./pages/Admin";import Lab from"./pages/Lab";import Blog from"./pages/Blog";import BlogDetail from"./pages/BlogDetail";import Footer from"./components/Footer";import PrivacyPolicy from"./pages/PrivacyPolicy";import ScrollToTop from"./components/ScrollToTop";import{usePerformanceMonitor}from"./hooks/usePerformanceMonitor";// Vanta.jsの型定義
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const vantaRef=useRef(null);// パフォーマンス監視を有効化
